Register.Name: SSCR
Register.Description: LTDC Synchronization Size Configuration Register This register defines the number of Horizontal Synchronization pixels minus 1 and the number of Vertical Synchronization lines minus 1. Refer to Figure 82 and Section 16.4: LTDC programmable parameters for an example of configuration.

BitField.Name: HSW
BitField.Description: Horizontal Synchronization Width (in units of pixel clock period) These bits define the number of Horizontal Synchronization pixel minus 1.

BitField.Name: VSH
BitField.Description: Vertical Synchronization Height (in units of horizontal scan line) These bits define the vertical Synchronization height minus 1. It represents the number of horizontal synchronization lines.

Register.Name: BPCR
Register.Description: LTDC Back Porch Configuration Register This register defines the accumulated number of Horizontal Synchronization and back porch pixels minus 1 (HSYNC Width + HBP- 1) and the accumulated number of Vertical Synchronization and back porch lines minus 1 (VSYNC Height + VBP - 1). Refer to Figure 82 and Section 16.4: LTDC programmable parameters for an example of configuration.

BitField.Name: AHBP
BitField.Description: Accumulated Horizontal back porch (in units of pixel clock period) These bits define the Accumulated Horizontal back porch width which includes the Horizontal Synchronization and Horizontal back porch pixels minus 1. The Horizontal back porch is the period between Horizontal Synchronization going inactive and the start of the active display part of the next scan line.

BitField.Name: AVBP
BitField.Description: Accumulated Vertical back porch (in units of horizontal scan line) These bits define the accumulated Vertical back porch width which includes the Vertical Synchronization and Vertical back porch lines minus 1. The Vertical back porch is the number of horizontal scan lines at a start of frame to the start of the first active scan line of the next frame.

Register.Name: AWCR
Register.Description: LTDC Active Width Configuration Register This register defines the accumulated number of Horizontal Synchronization, back porch and Active pixels minus 1 (HSYNC width + HBP + Active Width - 1) and the accumulated number of Vertical Synchronization, back porch lines and Active lines minus 1 (VSYNC Height+ BVBP + Active Height - 1). Refer to Figure 82 and Section 16.4: LTDC programmable parameters for an example of configuration.

BitField.Name: AAW
BitField.Description: Accumulated Active Width (in units of pixel clock period) These bits define the Accumulated Active Width which includes the Horizontal Synchronization, Horizontal back porch and Active pixels minus 1. The Active Width is the number of pixels in active display area of the panel scan line. The maximum Active Width supported is 0x400.

BitField.Name: AAH
BitField.Description: Accumulated Active Height (in units of horizontal scan line) These bits define the Accumulated Height which includes the Vertical Synchronization, Vertical back porch and the Active Height lines minus 1. The Active Height is the number of active lines in the panel. The maximum Active Height supported is 0x300.

Register.Name: TWCR
Register.Description: LTDC Total Width Configuration Register This register defines the accumulated number of Horizontal Synchronization, back porch, Active and front porch pixels minus 1 (HSYNC Width + HBP + Active Width + HFP - 1) and the accumulated number of Vertical Synchronization, back porch lines, Active and Front lines minus 1 (VSYNC Height+ BVBP + Active Height + VFP - 1). Refer to Figure 82 and Section 16.4: LTDC programmable parameters for an example of configuration.

BitField.Name: TOTALW
BitField.Description: Total Width (in units of pixel clock period) These bits defines the accumulated Total Width which includes the Horizontal Synchronization, Horizontal back porch, Active Width and Horizontal front porch pixels minus 1.

BitField.Name: TOTALH
BitField.Description: Total Height (in units of horizontal scan line) These bits defines the accumulated Height which includes the Vertical Synchronization, Vertical back porch, the Active Height and Vertical front porch Height lines minus 1.

Register.Name: GCR
Register.Description: LTDC Global Control Register This register defines the global configuration of the LCD-TFT controller.

BitField.Name: HSPOL
BitField.Description: Horizontal Synchronization Polarity This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: Horizontal Synchronization polarity is active low 1: Horizontal Synchronization polarity is active high

BitField.Name: VSPOL
BitField.Description: Vertical Synchronization Polarity This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: Vertical Synchronization is active low 1: Vertical Synchronization is active high

BitField.Name: DEPOL
BitField.Description: Data Enable Polarity This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: Data Enable polarity is active low 1: Data Enable polarity is active high

BitField.Name: PCPOL
BitField.Description: Pixel Clock Polarity This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: input pixel clock 1: inverted input pixel clock

BitField.Name: DEN
BitField.Description: Dither Enable This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: Dither disable 1: Dither enable

BitField.Name: DRW[2:0]
BitField.Description: Dither Red Width These bits return the Dither Red Bits

BitField.Name: DGW[2:0]
BitField.Description: Dither Green Width These bits return the Dither Green Bits

BitField.Name: DBW[2:0]
BitField.Description: Dither Blue Width These bits return the Dither Blue Bits

BitField.Name: LTDCEN
BitField.Description: LCD-TFT controller enable bit This bit is set and cleared by software. 0: LTDC disable 1: LTDC enable

Register.Name: SRCR
Register.Description: LTDC Shadow Reload Configuration Register This register allows to reload either immediately or during the vertical blanking period, the shadow registers values to the active registers. The shadow registers are all Layer1 and Layer2 registers except the LTDC_L1CLUTWR and the LTDC_L2CLUTWR. Note: The shadow registers read back the active values. Until the reload has been done, the 'old' value will be read.

BitField.Name: VBR
BitField.Description: Vertical Blanking Reload This bit is set by software and cleared only by hardware after reload. (it cannot be cleared through register write once it is set) 0: No effect 1: The shadow registers are reloaded during the vertical blanking period (at the beginning of the first line after the Active Display Area)

BitField.Name: IMR
BitField.Description: Immediate Reload This bit is set by software and cleared only by hardware after reload. 0: No effect 1: The shadow registers are reloaded immediately

Register.Name: BCCR
Register.Description: LTDC Background Color Configuration Register This register defines the background color (RGB888).

BitField.Name: BCRED[7:0]
BitField.Description: Background Color Red value These bits configure the background red value

BitField.Name: BCGREEN[7:0]
BitField.Description: Background Color Green value These bits configure the background green value

BitField.Name: BCBLUE[7:0]
BitField.Description: Background Color Blue value These bits configure the background blue value

Register.Name: IER
Register.Description: LTDC Interrupt Enable Register This register determines which status flags generate an interrupt request by setting the corresponding bit to 1.

BitField.Name: RRIE
BitField.Description: Register Reload interrupt enable This bit is set and cleared by software 0: Register Reload interrupt disable 1: Register Reload interrupt enable

BitField.Name: TERRIE
BitField.Description: Transfer Error Interrupt Enable This bit is set and cleared by software 0: Transfer Error interrupt disable 1: Transfer Error interrupt enable

BitField.Name: FUIE
BitField.Description: FIFO Underrun Interrupt Enable This bit is set and cleared by software 0: FIFO Underrun interrupt disable 1: FIFO Underrun Interrupt enable

BitField.Name: LIE
BitField.Description: Line Interrupt Enable This bit is set and cleared by software 0: Line interrupt disable 1: Line Interrupt enable

Register.Name: ISR
Register.Description: LTDC Interrupt Status Register This register returns the interrupt status flag

BitField.Name: RRIF
BitField.Description: Register Reload Interrupt Flag 0: No Register Reload interrupt generated 1: Register Reload interrupt generated when a vertical blanking reload occurs (and the first line after the active area is reached)

BitField.Name: TERRIF
BitField.Description: Transfer Error interrupt flag 0: No Transfer Error interrupt generated 1: Transfer Error interrupt generated when a Bus error occurs

BitField.Name: FUIF
BitField.Description: FIFO Underrun Interrupt flag 0: NO FIFO Underrun interrupt generated. 1: A FIFO underrun interrupt is generated, if one of the layer FIFOs is empty and pixel data is read from the FIFO

BitField.Name: LIF
BitField.Description: Line Interrupt flag 0: No Line interrupt generated 1: A Line interrupt is generated, when a programmed line is reached

BitField.Name: CRRIF
BitField.Description: Clears Register Reload Interrupt Flag 0: No effect 1: Clears the RRIF flag in the LTDC_ISR register

BitField.Name: CTERRIF
BitField.Description: Clears the Transfer Error Interrupt Flag 0: No effect 1: Clears the TERRIF flag in the LTDC_ISR register.

BitField.Name: CFUIF
BitField.Description: Clears the FIFO Underrun Interrupt flag 0: No effect 1: Clears the FUDERRIF flag in the LTDC_ISR register.

BitField.Name: CLIF
BitField.Description: Clears the Line Interrupt Flag 0: No effect 1: Clears the LIF flag in the LTDC_ISR register.

Register.Name: LIPCR
Register.Description: LTDC Line Interrupt Position Configuration Register This register defines the position of the line interrupt. The line value to be programmed depends on the timings parameters. Refer to Figure 82.

BitField.Name: LIPOS[10:0]
BitField.Description: Line Interrupt Position These bits configure the line interrupt position

Register.Name: CPSR
Register.Description: LTDC Current Position Status Register This register defines the position of the line interrupt. The line value to be programmed depends on the timings parameters. Refer to Figure 82.

BitField.Name: CXPOS[15:0]
BitField.Description: Current X Position These bits return the current X position

BitField.Name: CYPOS[15:0]
BitField.Description: Current Y Position These bits return the current Y position

Register.Name: CDSR
Register.Description: LTDC Current Display Status Register This register returns the status of the current display phase which is controlled by the HSYNC, VSYNC, and Horizontal/Vertical DE signals. Example: if the current display phase is the vertical synchronization, the VSYNCS bit is set (active high). If the current display phase is the horizontal synchronization, the HSYNCS bit is active high.

BitField.Name: HSYNCS
BitField.Description: Horizontal Synchronization display Status 0: Active low 1: Active high

BitField.Name: VSYNCS
BitField.Description: Vertical Synchronization display Status 0: Active low 1: Active high

BitField.Name: HDES
BitField.Description: Horizontal Data Enable display Status 0: Active low 1: Active high

BitField.Name: VDES
BitField.Description: Vertical Data Enable display Status 0: Active low 1: Active high
